posts.post_content:
Good Morning,

I'm working on the mini monster in an SGC/PSA 1.5 or 2 grade.

If you have any that are reasonably priced, please let me know.
Commons, stars, SL, ML, etc etc etc.

I would prefer common backs to keep the price down.

Thanks in advance!!!
Friday afternoon bump for some 1.5s and 2s.
